message.name: ERR_ALTNAME_MRE
message.locale: A person cannot have more than one "%1c" name.

message.name: ERR_ALTNAME_XRV_NAME_TYPE_CHANGED
message.locale: You cannot change the type of the registered name.

message.name: ERR_ALTNAME_XRV_REGNAME_EMPTY
message.locale: This person does not have a registered name. Please add a registered name before continuing.

message.name: ERR_PERSON_XFV_NAMETYPE_NAMESTATUS
message.locale: You can't delete a registered name.

message.name: ERR_ALTNAME_XRV_DUPLICATE_CLIENT_CREATE
message.locale: New alternate name details cannot be added for a client that is currently marked as a duplicate.

message.name: ERR_ALTNAME_XRV_DUPLICATE_CLIENT_MODIFY
message.locale: Alternate name details of a client that is currently marked as a duplicate cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_ALTNAME_XRV_DUPLICATE_CLIENT_DELETE
message.locale: Alternate name details for a client that is currently marked as a duplicate cannot be deleted.

message.name: ERR_FV_UPPERFIRST_NAME_EXCEEDED_LIMIT
message.locale: The limit on First Name has been exceeded by %1n character(s).

message.name: ERR_FV_UPPERLAST_NAME_EXCEEDED_LIMIT
message.locale: The limit on Last Name has been exceeded by %1n character(s).

message.name: ERR_FV_UPPERBIRTH_NAME_EXCEEDED_LIMIT
message.locale: The limit on Birth Last Name has been exceeded by %1n character(s).

message.name: ERR_FV_UPPERMOTHER_BIRTH_SURNAME_EXCEEDED_LIMIT
message.locale: The limit on Mother's Birth Last Name has been exceeded by %1n character(s).
